channel.title: Bounties on Skycoin Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bounties on Skycoin Blog

item.title: Development Update #16
item.description: Summary: The new developers for the meshnet are setup and working now. The source routing implementation is almost done. wifi controller library is working and just needs adhoc mode support and some bug fixes. Last gui changes to wallet are being made. One of the coin developers who was on vacation for past two weeks is coming back to project. First draft the of Obelisk white paper is done.
